javax.swing.event.TableColumnModelEvent

  • ??TableColumnModelEvent???? 
    ??? ??
    javax.swing
    Provides a set of "lightweight" (all-Java language) components that, to the maximum degree possible, work the same on all platforms.
    javax.swing.event
    Provides for events fired by Swing components.
    javax.swing.table
    Provides classes and interfaces for dealing with javax.swing.JTable.

    • javax.swing?TableColumnModelEvent???

      ?????TableColumnModelEvent?javax.swing???? 
      ?????? ?????
      void JTable.columnAdded(TableColumnModelEvent e)
      Invoked when a column is added to the table column model.
      void JTable.AccessibleJTable.columnAdded(TableColumnModelEvent e)
      Track changes to the table contents (column insertions)
      void JTable.columnMoved(TableColumnModelEvent e)
      Invoked when a column is repositioned.
      void JTable.AccessibleJTable.columnMoved(TableColumnModelEvent e)
      Track changes of a column repositioning.
      void JTable.columnRemoved(TableColumnModelEvent e)
      Invoked when a column is removed from the table column model.
      void JTable.AccessibleJTable.columnRemoved(TableColumnModelEvent e)
      Track changes to the table contents (column deletions)

      void TableColumnModelListener.columnAdded(TableColumnModelEvent e)
      Tells listeners that a column was added to the model.

      Tells listeners that a column was repositioned.
      void TableColumnModelListener.columnRemoved(TableColumnModelEvent e)
      Tells listeners that a column was removed from the model.
